title: Looking for people to play norms with
body:
I'm relatively new and looking to make some friends to have fun and learn with in some blind pick games.

add me: MedievalWraith 

thanks :D

replies.body:
Hi MedievalWraith! 

My name is Huskey, a staff member for the gaming community AGC. Noticed your post while browsing the boards and thought I would share our discord link with you, https://discord.gg/4uuGk. We are a friendly community with hundreds of active members, come say hi, and I'm sure you'll find plenty of people to play normal games with!

> [{quoted}](name=Legit A Korean,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=7nLhn9AB,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-04-17T10:46:39.117+0000)
>
> Hi MedievalWraith! 
> 
> My name is Huskey, a staff member for the gaming community AGC. Noticed your post while browsing the boards and thought I would share our discord link with you, https://discord.gg/4uuGk. We are a friendly community with hundreds of active members, come say hi, and I'm sure you'll find plenty of people to play normal games with!

I'll definately pop in and say hi, thanks!
